subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Sebastian Vettel, a 21-year-old German, became the youngest driver to win a Formula One race, capturing the Italian Grand Prix on a wet Monza course that made for difficult driving.
snippet: Sebastian Vettel, a 21-year-old German, became the youngest driver to win a Formula One race, capturing the Italian Grand Prix on a wet Monza course that made for difficult driving.
